mapper.select: SELECT P.product_num , P.product_main_img_real_file , P.product_name , P.product_price , C.product_count FROM PRODUCT P JOIN CART C ON P.product_num = C.product_num WHERE C.member_id = #{sId}
mapper.update: UPDATE CART C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.product_num = P.product_num SET C.product_price = C.product_count * P.product_price WHERE C.member_id = #{sId};
